name: Black Forest
description: A decadent German classic featuring layers of rich chocolate sponge, airy whipped cream, and juicy cherries, topped with chocolate shavings and cherry glaze.

name: Blue Berry Bliss
description: A moist vanilla cake layered with fresh blueberry compote and light cream, offering a fruity burst in every bite.

name: Chocolate Truffle
description: A dense and luxurious chocolate cake layered with silky smooth ganache and finished with a rich chocolate glaze.

name: Coffee Cr√®me
description: A delightful coffee-infused sponge paired with layers of espresso buttercream and a hint of cocoa, perfect for coffee lovers.

name: Hazelnut Heaven
description: A nutty indulgence with layers of hazelnut praline, chocolate cream, and crunchy roasted hazelnuts.

name: Lemon Zest
description: A refreshing and tangy lemon sponge cake topped with creamy lemon glaze and fresh zest for a zippy finish.

name: Mango Mousse
description: A light and airy mango mousse gently set on a soft vanilla sponge base, bursting with tropical flavor.

name: Pineapple Paradise
description: Fluffy sponge layers filled with juicy pineapple chunks and whipped cream, giving a tropical escape in every bite.

name: Rainbow Fantasy
description: A vibrant celebration of colors with six layers of soft vanilla sponge, each a different hue, layered with velvety vanilla frosting.

name: Red Velvet
description: A rich and smooth red velvet cake layered with tangy cream cheese frosting and a hint of cocoa.

name: Strawberry Swirl
description: Swirls of real strawberry puree blend into soft vanilla cream layers, creating a sweet and fruity treat.

name: Vanilla Delight
description: A timeless classic made with soft vanilla sponge and a generous topping of whipped cream, simple yet satisfying.
